issue.title: Could we add a choke to the solar array power cable

content.raw:
I will note that I have picked up the cable as it is and plugged it in, admittedly in 'demi-god' mode.  It is very hard, and I have to say that the choke didn't really help a lot (it still has a diameter smaller than the grasp of the best grip of the fingers).  But as a data point for you, a non zero number of competitors have accomplished the task of picking up the cable as it is.

But if it's going to change anymore, I'd really like it if the changes could be sooner rather than later...
content.html:
I will note that I have picked up the cable as it is and plugged it in, admittedly in 'demi-god' mode. It is very hard, and I have to say that the choke didn't really help a lot (it still has a diameter smaller than the grasp of the best grip of the fingers). But as a data point for you, a non zero number of competitors have accomplished the task of picking up the cable as it is.

But if it's going to change anymore, I'd really like it if the changes could be sooner rather than later...
